column6: "Homeschooling"  New creative team!  Cataclysmic new direction! In this arc, one Runaway will die, and one Runaway will live! Rising star Kathryn Immonen (PATSY WALKER: HELLCAT) and Sarah Pichelli (NYX) take the reins of the Runaways. Making out? Check.  Cliffhangers? Check.  Silly hats?  Check.  This is the Runaways arc you CAN'T miss.  Part 1 (of 4). Rated T  ...$2.99
column8: | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | inker:David Lafuente Garcia | inker:Sara Pichelli | writer:Kathryn Immonen | colorist:Christina Strain
